front.title: A Framework for SDP Attributes when Multiplexing

abstract.t: Communication sessions in RTCWeb are described and negotiated using Session Description Protocol(SDP)[RFC4566] mechanisms. SDP uses attributes to describes specific aspects of such a session. These attributes have different impacts when using varions of multiplexing RTP on a single transport layer flow. The scope of this specification is to provide a framework for analyzing the multiplex characteristics for SDP attributes and provide multiplexing characteristics of existing attributes.
